entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except south 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon then light late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
